item.title: Welcome!
item.description: If you don’t know yet, my name is Michael A. Agarenzo, and I am a Software Engineer. Update: May 6, 2019 - I am now a Platform Engineer at Varick! This is the beginnings of my website’s migration back to Hugo to start up my blog again. Hugo is “the world’s fastest framework for building websites”, which is great because I often (mercilessly) rebuild pages over and over again, even after the tiniest of changes, to confirm that I like the way they look.
